metadata.title: Aerial Survey and Scat Collection of Steller Sea Lions in the Kodiak Region

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries

metadata.description:
Monthly aerial survey and quarterly scat collection.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supported by NPMR "Availability and use of prey by Steller Sea Lions in the Kodiak."

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
